column4: Is there a way for me to connect my Lucid Lynx PC to a Windows 7 network so I'm visible (whether or not I have file sharing enabled)?
on the linux box do ifconfig and check the settigns, on the windows box do ipconfig and check the settings
Well, if it is already happening, then why am I NOT VISIBLE on the network I'm connected to via my wireless card?
and beware subnetMASK is not the same as subnet
